name: Mallow Drops
description: Mallow Drops is a gravity puzzle where two kiwis try to rescue their lost eggs in a shattered world. Getting to where you need to go is half the fun - just be sure to look before you leap!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or later Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
